moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6: Philidor defence. Let's see what happens.
moves.4. dxe5 fxe4 5. Ng5 d5 6. Nc3: I didn't press on with the del Rio attack.
moves.8. Bf4: Time to start some proper development. Everything is fast paced in this game!
moves.8... Qf6 9. Nxd5: Sacrifice! Assuming he takes it, there will be a hole in his pawns where my white bishop can give him check.
This sure is action packed very early on!
moves.12... Nc6 13. Qxb7 Rd8 14. Qxc6+: I've collected a lot of pawns and now his knight. My white knight sacrifice was well worth it.
moves.16... Qe5 17. Rd1: Black decides to call it quits.

opening: Philidor (C41), Philidor counter-gambit, del Rio attack
